albedo.long_name: Snow surface albedo or the fraction of radiation reflected from the snowpack surface

cap_waterin.long_name: Infiltration and any cascading interflow and Dunnian surface runoff added to capillary reservoir storage

contrib_fraction.long_name: Contributing area of each HRU pervious area

dprst_area_open.long_name: Surface area of open surface depressions based on storage volume

lateral_flow.long_name: Lateral flow from HRU into the corresponding stream segment

hru_intcpstor.long_name: HRU area-weighted average Interception storage in the canopy for each HRU

hru_impervstor.long_name: HRU area-weighted average storage on impervious area for each HRU

basin_actet_mo.long_name: Monthly basin area-weighted average actual ET

basin_actet_tot.long_name: Total simulation basin area-weighted average actual ET

basin_actet_yr.long_name: Yearly basin area-weighted average actual ET

basin_cap_infil_tot.long_name: Basin area-weighted average infiltration with cascading flow into capillary reservoirs

basin_cap_up_max.long_name: Basin area-weighted average maximum cascade flow that flows to capillary reservoirs

basin_capwaterin.long_name: Basin area-weighted average infiltration, cascading interflow and Dunnian flow added to capillary reservoir storage

basin_cfs.long_name: Streamflow leaving the basin through the stream network

basin_cfs_mo.long_name: Monthly total streamflow to stream network

basin_cfs_tot.long_name: Total simulation basin area-weighted average streamflow

basin_cfs_yr.long_name: Yearly total streamflow to stream network

basin_changeover.long_name: Basin area-weighted average water released from a change over of canopy cover type

basin_cms.long_name: Streamflow leaving the basin through the stream network

basin_contrib_fraction.long_name: Basin area-weighted average contributing area of the pervious area of each HRU

basin_cpr_stor_frac.long_name: Basin area-weighted average fraction of capillary reservoir storage of the maximum storage

basin_dprst_evap.long_name: Basin area-weighted average evaporation from surface-depression storage

basin_dprst_seep.long_name: Basin area-weighted average seepage from surface-depression storage

basin_dprst_sroff.long_name: Basin area-weighted average surface runoff from open surface-depression storage

basin_dprst_volcl.long_name: Basin area-weighted average storage volume in closed surface depressions

basin_dprst_volop.long_name: Basin area-weighted average storage volume in open surface depressions

basin_dunnian.long_name: Basin area-weighted average Dunnian surface runoff that flows to the stream network

basin_dunnian_gvr.long_name: Basin area-weighted average excess flow to preferential-flow reservoirs from gravity reservoirs

basin_dunnian_pfr.long_name: Basin area-weighted average excess infiltration to preferential-flow reservoirs from variable infil

basin_gvr2pfr.long_name: Basin area-weighted average excess flow to preferential-flow reservoir storage from gravity reservoirs

basin_gvr_stor_frac.long_name: Basin area-weighted average fraction of gravity reservoir storage of the maximum storage

basin_gwflow.long_name: Basin area-weighted average of groundwater flow to the stream network

basin_gwflow_cfs.long_name: Basin area-weighted average of groundwater flow to the stream network

basin_gwflow_mo.long_name: Monthly basin area-weighted average groundwater discharge

basin_gwflow_tot.long_name: Total simulation basin area-weighted average groundwater discharge

basin_gwflow_yr.long_name: Yearly basin area-weighted average groundwater discharge

basin_gwin.long_name: Basin area-weighted average of inflow to GWRs

basin_gwsink.long_name: Basin area-weighted average of GWR outflow to the groundwater sink

basin_gwstor.long_name: Basin area-weighted average of storage in GWRs

basin_gwstor_minarea_wb.long_name: Basin area-weighted average storage added to each GWR when storage is less than gwstor_min

basin_horad.long_name: Potential shortwave radiation for the basin centroid

basin_imperv_evap.long_name: Basin area-weighted average evaporation from impervious area

basin_imperv_stor.long_name: Basin area-weighted average storage on impervious area

basin_infil.long_name: Basin area-weighted average infiltration to the capillary reservoirs

basin_intcp_evap.long_name: Basin area-weighted evaporation from the canopy

basin_intcp_evap_mo.long_name: Monthly basin area-weighted average interception evaporation

basin_intcp_evap_tot.long_name: Total simulation basin area-weighted average canopy evaporation

basin_intcp_evap_yr.long_name: Yearly basin area-weighted average canopy evaporation

basin_interflow_max.long_name: Basin area-weighted average maximum interflow that flows from gravity reservoirs

basin_lake_stor.long_name: Basin volume-weighted average storage for all lakes using broad-crested weir or gate opening routing

basin_lakeprecip.long_name: Basin area-weighted average precipitation on lake HRUs

basin_max_temp_mo.long_name: Monthly basin area-weighted average maximum air temperature

basin_max_temp_tot.long_name: Total simulation basin area-weighted average maximum temperature

basin_max_temp_yr.long_name: Yearly basin area-weighted average maximum temperature

basin_min_temp_mo.long_name: Monthly basin area-weighted average minimum air temperature

basin_min_temp_tot.long_name: Total simulation basin area-weighted average minimum temperature

basin_min_temp_yr.long_name: Yearly basin area-weighted average minimum temperature

basin_net_ppt_yr.long_name: Yearly basin area-weighted average net precipitation

basin_net_rain.long_name: Basin area-weighted average rain net precipitation

basin_net_snow.long_name: Basin area-weighted average snow net precipitation

basin_orad.long_name: Basin area-weighted average solar radiation on a horizontal surface

basin_perv_et.long_name: Basin area-weighted average ET from capillary reservoirs

basin_pfr_stor_frac.long_name: Basin area-weighted average fraction of preferential-flow reservoir storage of the maximum storage

basin_pk_precip.long_name: Basin area-weighted average precipitation added to snowpack

basin_potet_mo.long_name: Monthly basin area-weighted average potential ET

basin_potet_tot.long_name: Total simulation basin area-weighted average potential ET

basin_potet_yr.long_name: Yearly basin area-weighted average potential ET

basin_ppt_tot.long_name: Total simulation basin area-weighted average precipitation

basin_pref_flow_infil.long_name: Basin area-weighted average infiltration to preferential-flow reservoir storage

basin_pref_stor.long_name: Basin area-weighted average storage in preferential-flow reservoirs

basin_prefflow.long_name: Basin area-weighted average interflow from preferential-flow reservoirs to the stream network

basin_pweqv.long_name: Basin area-weighted average snowpack water equivalent (not including glacier)

basin_recharge.long_name: Basin area-weighted average recharge to GWRs

basin_segment_storage.long_name: Basin area-weighted average storage in the stream network

basin_slowflow.long_name: Basin area-weighted average interflow from gravity reservoirs to the stream network

basin_slstor.long_name: Basin area-weighted average storage of gravity reservoirs

basin_sm2gvr.long_name: Basin area-weighted average excess flow from capillary reservoirs to gravity reservoir storage

basin_sm2gvr_maxin.long_name: Basin area-weighted average maximum excess flow from capillary reservoirs that flows to gravity reservoirs

basin_snow.long_name: Basin area-weighted average snowfall for basin

basin_snowevap.long_name: Basin area-weighted average evaporation and sublimation from snowpack (not including glacier)

basin_snowmelt.long_name: Basin area-weighted average snowmelt (not on including snow on glacier)

basin_snowmelt_tot.long_name: Total simulation basin area-weighted average snowmelt

basin_soil_lower_stor_frac.long_name: Basin area-weighted average fraction of soil lower zone storage of the maximum storage

basin_soil_moist.long_name: Basin area-weighted average capillary reservoir storage

basin_soil_moist_tot.long_name: Basin area-weighted average total soil-zone water storage

basin_soil_rechr.long_name: Basin area-weighted average storage for recharge zone; upper portion of capillary reservoir where both evaporation and transpiration occurs

basin_soil_rechr_stor_frac.long_name: Basin area-weighted average fraction of soil recharge zone storage of the maximum storage

basin_soil_to_gw.long_name: Basin average excess flow to capillary reservoirs that drains to GWRs

basin_sroff.long_name: Basin area-weighted average surface runoff to the stream network

basin_sroff_cfs.long_name: Basin area-weighted average surface runoff to the stream network

basin_sroff_mo.long_name: Monthly basin area-weighted average surface runoff

basin_sroff_tot.long_name: Total simulation basin area-weighted average overland flow

basin_sroff_yr.long_name: Yearly basin area-weighted average overland runoff

basin_sroffi.long_name: Basin area-weighted average surface runoff from impervious areas

basin_sroffp.long_name: Basin area-weighted average surface runoff from pervious areas

basin_ssflow.long_name: Basin area-weighted average interflow from gravity and preferential-flow reservoirs to the stream network

basin_ssflow_cfs.long_name: Interflow leaving the basin through the stream network

basin_ssflow_tot.long_name: Total simulation basin area-weighted average interflow

basin_ssin.long_name: Basin area-weighted average inflow to gravity and preferential-flow reservoir storage

basin_ssstor.long_name: Basin weighted average gravity and preferential-flow reservoir storage

basin_stflow_in.long_name: Basin area-weighted average lateral flow entering the stream network

basin_stflow_mo.long_name: Monthly basin area-weighted average simulated streamflow

basin_stflow_out.long_name: Basin area-weighted average streamflow leaving through the stream network

basin_stflow_tot.long_name: Total simulation basin area-weighted average streamflow

basin_storage.long_name: Basin area-weighted average storage in all water storage reservoirs

basin_storvol.long_name: Basin area-weighted average storage volume in all water storage reservoirs

basin_surface_storage.long_name: Basin area-weighted average storage in all surface water storage reservoirs

basin_swale_et.long_name: Basin area-weighted average ET from swale HRUs

basin_sz2gw.long_name: Basin area-weighted average drainage from gravity reservoirs to GWRs

basin_sz_stor_frac.long_name: Basin area-weighted average fraction of soil zone storage of the maximum storage

basin_tcal.long_name: Basin area-weighted average net snowpack energy balance

basin_tmax.long_name: Basin area-weighted average maximum air temperature

basin_tmin.long_name: Basin area-weighted average minimum air temperature

basin_total_storage.long_name: Basin area-weighted average storage in all water storage reservoirs

basin_transp_on.long_name: Flag indicating whether transpiration is occurring anywhere in the basin (0=no; 1=yes)

canopy_covden.long_name: Canopy cover density for each HRU

cap_infil_tot.long_name: Infiltration and cascading interflow and Dunnian flow added to capillary reservoir storage for each HRU

dprst_area_clos.long_name: Surface area of closed surface depressions based on storage volume for each HRU

dprst_area_clos_max.long_name: Aggregate sum of closed surface-depression storage areas of each HRU

dprst_area_max.long_name: Aggregate sum of surface-depression storage areas of each HRU

dprst_area_open_max.long_name: Aggregate sum of open surface-depression storage areas of each HRU

dprst_evap_hru.long_name: Evaporation from surface-depression storage for each HRU

dprst_insroff_hru.long_name: Surface runoff from pervious and impervious portions into open and closed surface-depression storage for each HRU

dprst_seep_hru.long_name: Seepage from surface-depression storage to associated GWR for each HRU

dprst_sroff_hru.long_name: Surface runoff from open surface-depression storage for each HRU

dprst_vol_clos.long_name: Storage volume in closed surface depressions for each HRU

dprst_vol_clos_frac.long_name: Fraction of closed surface-depression storage of the maximum storage for each HRU

dprst_vol_frac.long_name: Fraction of surface-depression storage of the maximum storage for each HRU

dprst_vol_open.long_name: Storage volume in open surface depressions for each HRU

dprst_vol_open_frac.long_name: Fraction of open surface-depression storage of the maximum storage for each HRU

dunnian_flow.long_name: Dunnian surface runoff that flows to the stream network for each HRU

flow_headwater.long_name: Total flow out of headwater segments (segment_type=1)

flow_in_great_lakes.long_name: Total flow into model domain from Great Lakes (segment_type=10)

flow_in_nation.long_name: Total flow into model domain from Mexico or Canada (segment_type=4)

flow_out.long_name: Total flow out of model domain

flow_out_NHM.long_name: Total flow out of model domain to Mexico or Canada (segment_type=5)

flow_replacement.long_name: Total flow out from replacement flow (segment_type=3)

frac_swe.long_name: Fraction of maximum snow-water equivalent (snarea_thresh) on each HRU

freeh2o.long_name: Storage of free liquid water in the snowpack on each HRU

gw_in_soil.long_name: Drainage from capillary reservoir excess water for each GWR

gw_in_ssr.long_name: Drainage from gravity reservoir excess water for each GWR

gwres_flow.long_name: Groundwater discharge from each GWR to the stream network

gwres_in.long_name: Total inflow to each GWR from associated capillary and gravity reservoirs

gwres_sink.long_name: Outflow from GWRs to the groundwater sink; water is considered underflow or flow to deep aquifers and does not flow to the stream network

gwstor_minarea_wb.long_name: Storage added to each GWR when storage is less than gwstor_min

hortonian_flow.long_name: Hortonian surface runoff reaching stream network for each HRU

hru_et_yr.long_name: Yearly area-weighted average actual ET for each HRU

hru_frac_perv.long_name: Fraction of HRU that is pervious

hru_imperv.long_name: Area of HRU that is impervious

hru_impervevap.long_name: HRU area-weighted average evaporation from impervious area for each HRU

hru_intcpevap.long_name: HRU area-weighted average evaporation from the canopy for each HRU

hru_lateral_flow.long_name: Lateral flow to stream network from each HRU

hru_perv.long_name: Area of HRU that is pervious

hru_sroffi.long_name: HRU area-weighted average surface runoff from impervious areas for each HRU

hru_sroffp.long_name: HRU area-weighted average surface runoff from pervious areas for each HRU

hru_streamflow_out.long_name: Total flow to stream network from each HRU

iasw.long_name: Flag indicating that snow covered area is interpolated between previous location on curve and maximum (1), or is on the defined curve (0)

imperv_evap.long_name: Evaporation from impervious area for each HRU

imperv_stor.long_name: Storage on impervious area for each HRU

infil.long_name: Infiltration to the capillary and preferential-flow reservoirs for each HRU

int_alb.long_name: Flag to indicate (1: accumulation season curve; 2: use of the melt season curve)

intcp_changeover.long_name: Water released from a change over of canopy cover type for each HRU

intcp_evap.long_name: Evaporation from the canopy for each HRU

intcp_form.long_name: Form (0=rain; 1=snow) of interception for each HRU

intcp_on.long_name: Flag indicating interception storage for each HRU (0=no; 1=yes)

intcp_stor.long_name: Interception storage in canopy for cover density for each HRU

iso.long_name: Flag to indicate if time is before (1) or after (2) the day to force melt season (melt_force)

last_basin_stor.long_name: Basin area-weighted average storage in all water storage reservoirs from previous time step

lso.long_name: Counter for tracking the number of days the snowpack is at or above 0 degrees Celsius

lst.long_name: Flag indicating whether there was new snow that was insufficient to reset the albedo curve (1) (albset_snm or albset_sna), otherwise (0)

mso.long_name: Flag to indicate if time is before (1) or after (2) the first potential day for melt season (melt_look)

net_ppt.long_name: Precipitation (rain and/or snow) that falls through the canopy for each HRU

net_rain.long_name: Rain that falls through canopy for each HRU

net_snow.long_name: Snow that falls through canopy for each HRU

newsnow.long_name: Flag to indicate if new snow fell on each HRU (0=no; 1=yes)

obs_runoff_mo.long_name: Monthly measured streamflow at basin outlet

obs_runoff_tot.long_name: Total simulation measured streamflow at basin outlet

obs_runoff_yr.long_name: Yearly measured streamflow at basin outlet

obsq_inches.long_name: Measured streamflow at specified outlet station

obsq_inches_mo.long_name: Monthly measured streamflow at specified outlet station

obsq_inches_tot.long_name: Total simulation basin area-weighted average measured streamflow at specified outlet station

obsq_inches_yr.long_name: Yearly measured streamflow at specified outlet station

orad.long_name: Measured or computed solar radiation on a horizontal surface

orad_hru.long_name: Solar radiation on a horizontal surface for each HRU

perv_actet.long_name: Actual ET from the capillary reservoir of each HRU

pk_def.long_name: Heat deficit, amount of heat necessary to make the snowpack isothermal at 0 degrees Celsius

pk_den.long_name: Density of the snowpack on each HRU

pk_depth.long_name: Depth of snowpack on each HRU

pk_ice.long_name: Storage of frozen water in the snowpack on each HRU

pk_precip.long_name: Precipitation added to snowpack for each HRU

pk_temp.long_name: Temperature of the snowpack on each HRU

pksv.long_name: Snowpack water equivalent when there is new snow and in melt phase; used to interpolate between depletion curve and 100 percent on each HRU

pkwater_ante.long_name: Antecedent snowpack water equivalent on each HRU

potet_lower.long_name: Potential ET in the lower zone of the capillary reservoir for each HRU

potet_rechr.long_name: Potential ET in the recharge zone of the capillary reservoir for each HRU

pptmix.long_name: Flag to indicate if precipitation is a mixture of rain and snow for each HRU (0=no; 1=yes)

pptmix_nopack.long_name: Flag indicating that a mixed precipitation event has occurred with no snowpack present on an HRU (1), otherwise (0)

pref_flow.long_name: Interflow from the preferential-flow reservoir that flows to the stream network for each HRU

pref_flow_in.long_name: Infiltration and flow from gravity reservoir to the preferential-flow reservoir

pref_flow_infil.long_name: Infiltration to the preferential-flow reservoir storage for each HRU

pref_flow_max.long_name: Maximum storage of the preferential-flow reservoir for each HRU

pref_flow_stor.long_name: Storage in preferential-flow reservoir for each HRU

pref_flow_thrsh.long_name: Soil storage threshold defining storage between field capacity and maximum soil saturation minus preferential-flow storage

prmx.long_name: Fraction of rain in a mixed precipitation event for each HRU

pss.long_name: Previous snowpack water equivalent plus new snow

pst.long_name: While a snowpack exists, pst tracks the maximum snow water equivalent of that snowpack

recharge.long_name: Recharge to the associated GWR as sum of soil_to_gw and ssr_to_gw for each HRU

salb.long_name: Days since last new snow to reset albedo for each HRU

scrv.long_name: Snowpack water equivalent plus a portion of new snow on each HRU

seg_ccov.long_name: Area-weighted average cloud cover fraction for each segment from HRUs contributing flow to the segment

seg_gwflow.long_name: Area-weighted average groundwater discharge for each segment from HRUs contributing flow to the segment and upstream HRUs

seg_humid.long_name: Area-weighted average relative humidity for each segment from HRUs contributing flow to the segment

seg_melt.long_name: Area-weighted average snowmelt for each segment from HRUs contributing flow to the segment

seg_potet.long_name: HRU area-weighted average potential ET for each segment

seg_rain.long_name: Area-weighted average rainfall for each segment from HRUs contributing flow to the segment

seg_shade.long_name: Area-weighted average shade fraction for each segment

seg_sroff.long_name: Area-weighted average surface runoff for each segment from HRUs contributing flow to the segment and upstream HRUs

seg_ssflow.long_name: Area-weighted average interflow for each segment from HRUs contributing flow to the segment and upstream HRUs

seg_tave_air.long_name: Area-weighted average air temperature for each segment from HRUs contributing flow to the segment

seg_tave_upstream.long_name: Temperature of streamflow entering each segment

seg_upstream_inflow.long_name: Sum of inflow from upstream segments

seginc_gwflow.long_name: Area-weighted average groundwater discharge for each segment from HRUs contributing flow to the segment

seginc_potet.long_name: Area-weighted average potential ET for each segment from HRUs contributing flow to the segment

seginc_sroff.long_name: Area-weighted average surface runoff for each segment from HRUs contributing flow to the segment

seginc_ssflow.long_name: Area-weighted average interflow for each segment from HRUs contributing flow to the segment

seginc_swrad.long_name: Area-weighted average solar radiation for each segment from HRUs contributing flow to the segment

segment_delta_flow.long_name: Cumulative flow in minus flow out for each stream segment

slow_flow.long_name: Interflow from gravity reservoir storage that flows to the stream network for each HRU

slow_stor.long_name: Storage of gravity reservoir for each HRU

slst.long_name: Days since last new snow for each HRU

snow_evap.long_name: Evaporation and sublimation from snowpack on each HRU

snow_free.long_name: Fraction of snow-free surface for each HRU

snowcov_area.long_name: Snow-covered area on each HRU prior to melt and sublimation unless snowpack depleted

snowcov_areasv.long_name: Snow cover fraction when there is new snow and in melt phase; used to interpolate between depletion curve and 100 percent on each HRU

snowmelt.long_name: Snowmelt from snowpack on each HRU (not including snow on glacier)

snsv.long_name: Tracks the cumulative amount of new snow until there is enough to reset the albedo curve (albset_snm or albset_sna)

soil_lower.long_name: Storage in the lower zone of the capillary reservoir that is only available for transpiration for each HRU

soil_lower_ratio.long_name: Water content ratio in the lower zone of the capillary reservoir for each HRU

soil_rechr.long_name: Storage for recharge zone (upper portion) of the capillary reservoir that is available for both evaporation and transpiration

soil_saturated.long_name: Flag set if infiltration saturates capillary reservoir (0=no, 1=yes)

soil_to_gw.long_name: Portion of excess flow to the capillary reservoir that drains to the associated GWR for each HRU

soil_to_ssr.long_name: Portion of excess flow to the capillary reservoir that flows to the gravity reservoir for each HRU

solrad_tmax.long_name: Basin daily maximum temperature for use with solar radiation calculations

solrad_tmin.long_name: Basin daily minimum temperature for use with solar radiation calculations

sroff.long_name: Surface runoff to the stream network for each HRU

ssr_to_gw.long_name: Drainage from the gravity-reservoir to the associated GWR for each HRU

ssres_flow.long_name: Interflow from gravity and preferential-flow reservoirs to the stream network for each HRU

ssres_in.long_name: Inflow to the gravity and preferential-flow reservoirs for each HRU

ssres_stor.long_name: Storage in the gravity and preferential-flow reservoirs for each HRU

swale_actet.long_name: Evaporation from the gravity and preferential-flow reservoirs that exceeds sat_threshold

swrad.long_name: Shortwave radiation distributed to each HRU

tavgc.long_name: Average air temperature distributed to each HRU

tavgf.long_name: Average air temperature distributed to each HRU

tcal.long_name: Net snowpack energy balance on each HRU

tmaxc.long_name: Maximum air temperature distributed to each HRU

tmaxf.long_name: Maximum air temperature distributed to each HRU

tminc.long_name: Minimum air temperature distributed to each HRU

tminf.long_name: Minimum air temperature distributed to each HRU

transp_on.long_name: Flag indicating whether transpiration is occurring (0=no; 1=yes)
